articles.author: Angelo Amante, Emma Farge
articles.title: Heatwave brings health warnings as extreme weather grips globe - Reuters
articles.description: Temperatures were expected to reach record highs in Italy on Tuesday and the World Meteorological Organization warned of an increased risk of deaths as heatwaves and extreme weather gripped parts of Europe, Asia and the United States.
articles.content: ROME, July 18 (Reuters) - Temperatures were expected to reach record highs in Italy on Tuesday and the World Meteorological Organization warned of an increased risk of deaths as heatwaves and extreme… [+5226 chars]
